comments:
Performs EM-iteration on a single document for calculation of likelihood for a maximum iteration of `max_iter`.

Parameters ---------- doc_word_ids : int Id of corresponding words in a document. doc_word_counts : int Count of words in a single document. alpha : numpy.ndarray Lda equivalent value of alpha. beta : numpy.ndarray Lda equivalent value of beta. max_iter : int, optional Maximum number of times the expectation will be maximised.
##### Returns
* **(numpy.ndarray, numpy.ndarray)
    Computed (**: math
